content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and a chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Copper cable factory
No structures found for copper cable factory

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when boiler is out of fuel
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to generate steam before attempting to use it

### Errors when steam engine is not connected
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to a boiler and a power pole before attempting to use it

### Errors when offshore pump is not working
- Ensure the offshore pump is working and connected to a boiler before attempting to use it

### Errors when burner mining drill is out of fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate before attempting to use it

### Errors when furnace is out of ingredients
- Ensure the furnace has enough ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it

### Errors when inserter is out of fuel
- Ensure the inserter has enough fuel to operate before attempting to use it

### Errors when pipe is not connected
- Ensure the pipe is connected to a boiler and a steam engine before attempting to use it
